title: Control Systems Engineering 6th c2011 Nise txtbk + solutions ISM
description:
Control Systems Engineering, 6th Edition (c2011), textbook and instructor solutions manual (ISM) by Norman S. Nise.

TEXTBOOK INFO: Google these 2 keywords together: Wiley productCd-EHEP001820
